description.zh-cn: 美国民主党籍政治人物，曾担任第32任美国副总统和第33任美国总统。他领导美国结束第二次世界大战，下令对日本使用原子弹，并开启冷战。其任内推行了“杜鲁门主义”和“马歇尔计划”，推动成立联合国和北约，并介入了国共内战和朝鲜战争。在国内，他以行政命令废除了军队中的种族隔离制度。
description.en: An American politician of the Democratic Party who served as the 32nd Vice President and the 33rd President of the United States. He led the U.S. to the end of World War II, ordered the use of atomic bombs against Japan, and initiated the Cold War. During his presidency, he implemented the Truman Doctrine and the Marshall Plan, promoted the establishment of the United Nations and NATO, and intervened in the Chinese Civil War and the Korean War. Domestically, he desegregated the armed forces by executive order.

nodes.id: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

zh-cn: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

description.zh-cn: 美国第32任总统，哈里·S·杜鲁门在其任内担任副总统。他于1945年4月12日在任上逝世。
description.en: The 32nd President of the United States, under whom Harry S. Truman served as Vice President. He died in office on April 12, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门的妻子，美国第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Harry S. Truman and First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门和贝丝·杜鲁门的独生女。
description.en: The only child of Harry S. Truman and Bess Truman.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门的父亲，是一位农夫和家畜商贩。
description.en: Father of Harry S. Truman, who was a farmer and livestock dealer.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门的妹妹。
description.en: Younger sister of Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 美国武装力量的陆上军种。
description.en: The land service branch of the United States Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 一场于1914年至1918年间主要发生在欧洲的全球性战争。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe that lasted from 1914 to 1918.

description.zh-cn: 一场于1939年至1945年爆发的全球性战争。哈里·S·杜鲁门总统任内见证了其结束。
description.en: A global war that lasted from 1939 to 1945. President Harry S. Truman's tenure saw its conclusion.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪初堪萨斯城的民主党政治领袖，对哈里·S·杜鲁门的早期政治生涯提供了重要帮助。
description.en: A Democratic political boss in Kansas City in the early 20th century, who was instrumental in launching Harry S. Truman's political career.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

nodes.id: 广岛与长崎原子弹爆炸

zh-cn: 广岛与长崎原子弹爆炸
en: Atomic bombings of Hiroshima and Nagasaki

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战末期，美国在日本广岛和长崎投下两枚原子弹的军事行动。
description.en: The military action during the final stage of World War II in which the United States dropped two atomic bombs on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

description.zh-cn: 标志着第二次世界大战正式结束的事件。
description.en: The event that marked the formal end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后成立的国际组织，旨在促进国际合作与维护世界和平。
description.en: An international organization founded after World War II to promote international cooperation and maintain world peace.

description.zh-cn: 美国在冷战中遏制苏联势力扩张的外交政策，由哈里·S·杜鲁门总统提出。
description.en: An American foreign policy whose stated purpose was to contain Soviet geopolitical expansion during the Cold War, announced by President Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战后，以美国为首的西方集团与以苏联为首的东方集团之间的政治、经济和军事对抗。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension between the United States and the Soviet Union and their respective allies, the Western Bloc and the Eastern Bloc, which began following World War II.

description.zh-cn: 二战后美国对被战争破坏的西欧各国进行经济援助、协助重建的计划。
description.en: An American initiative to aid Western Europe, in which the United States gave economic assistance to help rebuild Western European economies after the end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 在杜鲁门总统任内成立的军事联盟，旨在对抗苏联领导的华沙条约组织。
description.en: A military alliance established during President Truman's tenure to counter the Warsaw Pact led by the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国与大韩民国之间的战争，美国在杜鲁门总统领导下率领联合国军参战。
description.en: A war between North Korea and South Korea, in which the United States, under President Truman, led a United Nations force.

nodes.id: 德怀特·大卫·艾森豪威尔

zh-cn: 德怀特·大卫·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 美国第34任总统，接替哈里·S·杜鲁门。他在1952年总统选举中击败了民主党候选人。
description.en: The 34th President of the United States, succeeding Harry S. Truman. He defeated the Democratic candidate in the 1952 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 由哈里·S·杜鲁门总统签署的行政命令，旨在废除美国军队中的种族隔离政策。
description.en: An executive order signed by President Harry S. Truman that abolished racial discrimination in the United States Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 在美国历史上，尤其是在军队和南部各州，系统性地将不同种族的人群在日常生活中隔离开来的政策和实践。
description.en: The policy and practice of systematically separating people of different races in daily life, particularly within the military and southern states in U.S. history.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，在朝鲜战争初期担任联合国军总司令，后因与杜鲁门总统在战略上发生严重分歧而被解职。
description.en: A five-star general in the United States Army who served as the commander of the United Nations Command in the early stages of the Korean War. He was later relieved of command by President Truman due to significant strategic disagreements.

en: Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在国共内战期间由中国国民党领导的中国政府。杜鲁门政府在其内战后期采取了“袖手旁观”政策。
description.en: The government of China led by the Kuomintang during the Chinese Civil War. The Truman administration adopted a "hands-off" policy in the later stages of the war.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的内战。杜鲁门政府的对华政策在此期间备受争议。
description.en: A civil war in China fought between the Kuomintang (KMT) and the Chinese Communist Party (CCP). The Truman administration's China policy during this period was highly controversial.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于西亚的国家。在美国总统哈里·S·杜鲁门的承认下于1948年宣布独立。
description.en: A country in Western Asia. It declared independence in 1948 with recognition from U.S. President Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆社会主义国家，是美国在冷战时期的主要对手。
description.en: A socialist state in Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991, and was the primary adversary of the United States during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 由杜鲁门总统签署的美国联邦法律，对美国军事和情报机构进行了重大重组，设立了国防部、中央情报局和国家安全会议。
description.en: A U.S. federal law signed by President Truman that was a major restructuring of the United States government's military and intelligence agencies, creating the Department of Defense, the Central Intelligence Agency, and the National Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 根据《1947年国家安全法案》设立的美国联邦行政部门，负责协调和监督所有政府机构和与国家安全和美国武装部队直接相关的职能。
description.en: An executive branch department of the federal government of the United States charged with coordinating and supervising all agencies and functions of the government concerned directly with national security and the United States Armed Forces, established by the National Security Act of 1947.

description.zh-cn: 根据《1947年国家安全法案》设立的美国主要情报机构之一。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence-gathering agencies of the United States federal government, established by the National Security Act of 1947.

description.zh-cn: 美国共和党参议员，他在1950年代初发起了声势浩大的反共运动（麦卡锡主义），期间曾强烈谴责杜鲁门政府对共产主义软弱。
description.en: A Republican U.S. Senator who instigated a massive anti-communist campaign (McCarthyism) in the early 1950s, during which he strongly condemned the Truman administration for being soft on communism.

relationships.target: 富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福

position.en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门在富兰克林·德拉诺·罗斯福总统的第四个任期内担任副总统，直至罗斯福去世。
description.en: Harry S. Truman served as Vice President during Franklin D. Roosevelt's fourth term until Roosevelt's death.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门与贝丝·华莱士于1919年6月28日结婚。
description.en: Harry S. Truman married Bess Wallace on June 28, 1919.

description.zh-cn: 玛格丽特·杜鲁门是哈里·S·杜鲁门的女儿。
description.en: Margaret Truman was the daughter of Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 玛格丽特·杜鲁门是贝丝·杜鲁门的女儿。
description.en: Margaret Truman was the daughter of Bess Truman.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门是约翰·安德森·杜鲁门的儿子。
description.en: Harry S. Truman was the son of John Anderson Truman.

description.zh-cn: 哈里·S·杜鲁门是马莎·埃伦·扬·杜鲁门的儿子。
description.en: Harry S. Truman was the son of Martha Ellen Young Truman.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·维维安·杜鲁门是哈里·S·杜鲁门的弟弟。
description.en: John Vivian Truman was the younger brother of Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 玛丽·简·杜鲁门是哈里·S·杜鲁门的妹妹。
description.en: Mary Jane Truman was the younger sister of Harry S. Truman.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门在第一次世界大战期间加入美国陆军，并在法国指挥一支炮兵部队。
description.en: Truman joined the U.S. Army during World War I and commanded an artillery unit in France.

description.zh-cn: 在汤姆·彭德格斯特的政治支持下，杜鲁门于1922年当选为杰克逊县法官，并于1934年当选为联邦参议员，开启了他的政治生涯。
description.en: With the political backing of Tom Pendergast, Truman was elected as a Jackson County judge in 1922 and as a U.S. Senator in 1934, launching his political career.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门在成为副总统前，曾担任代表密苏里州的联邦参议员。
description.en: Before becoming Vice President, Truman served as a U.S. Senator representing Missouri.

relationships.target: 广岛与长崎原子弹爆炸

description.zh-cn: 作为美国总统，杜鲁门批准并下令在日本广岛和长崎投下原子弹，以加速结束第二次世界大战。
description.en: As President of the United States, Truman authorized and ordered the dropping of atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japan, to hasten the end of World War II.

relationships.source: 广岛与长崎原子弹爆炸

description.zh-cn: 原子弹的毁灭性威力是促使日本最终决定无条件投降的关键因素之一。
description.en: The devastating power of the atomic bombs was one of the key factors that led to Japan's final decision to surrender unconditionally.

description.zh-cn: 日本于1945年9月2日正式签署投降书，标志着第二次世界大战的全面结束。
description.en: Japan formally signed the instrument of surrender on September 2, 1945, marking the definitive end of World War II.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门强烈支持成立联合国，并促成了首次联合国大会的召开。
description.en: Truman strongly supported the establishment of the United Nations and facilitated the convening of its first General Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统于1947年3月12日向国会发表讲话，正式提出“杜鲁门主义”，成为美国冷战时期“围堵政策”的开端。
description.en: President Truman formally announced the Truman Doctrine in a speech to Congress on March 12, 1947, marking the beginning of the U.S. policy of containment during the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: “杜鲁门主义”的提出标志着美国对苏政策的根本性转变，正式开启了冷战。
description.en: The announcement of the Truman Doctrine marked a fundamental shift in U.S. policy towards the Soviet Union, formally initiating the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门政府推动并落实了旨在重建欧洲、防止共产主义蔓延的“马歇尔计划”。
description.en: The Truman administration promoted and implemented the Marshall Plan, aimed at rebuilding Europe and preventing the spread of communism.

description.zh-cn: 在其任内，美国作为主要创始国之一推动成立了北大西洋公约组织，以建立集体防御体系对抗苏联。
description.en: During his presidency, the United States, as a key founding member, pushed for the establishment of NATO to create a collective defense system against the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门在美国国务院反对的情况下，在以色列宣布立国仅11分钟后便予以承认，对以色列的建立起到了关键的推动作用。
description.en: Despite opposition from the State Department, Truman recognized the state of Israel just 11 minutes after its declaration of independence, playing a crucial role in its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统签署了《行政命令9981号》，推动民权改革。
description.en: President Truman signed Executive Order 9981, advancing civil rights reform.

description.zh-cn: 该行政命令指令在美国军队中废除种族隔离政策。
description.en: This executive order mandated the desegregation of the U.S. Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜人民军入侵韩国后，杜鲁门总统立即下令美军并推动联合国进行军事干预。
description.en: After North Korean forces invaded South Korea, President Truman promptly ordered U.S. military intervention and pushed for United Nations action.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争的僵局以及解除麦克阿瑟职务等争议，对杜鲁门在国内的声望造成巨大打击，最终迫使他放弃在1952年竞选连任。
description.en: The stalemate in the Korean War and controversies such as the firing of General MacArthur severely damaged Truman's domestic popularity, ultimately compelling him to abandon his bid for reelection in 1952.

position.en: Commander of the United Nations Command

description.zh-cn: 在朝鲜战争期间，麦克阿瑟将军担任联合国军总司令，向作为总司令的杜鲁门总统负责。
description.en: During the Korean War, General MacArthur served as the Commander of the UN Command, reporting to President Truman as Commander-in-Chief.

description.zh-cn: 由于在朝鲜战争战略上存在严重分歧且麦克阿瑟公开表示不服从指令，杜鲁门总统解除了其联合国军总司令的职务。
description.en: Due to serious strategic disagreements in the Korean War and MacArthur's public insubordination, President Truman relieved him of his command of the UN forces.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门政府在国共内战后期对华采取“袖手旁观”政策，实行武器禁运，并于1949年发表《中美关系白皮书》，停止了对中华民国政府的军事援助。
description.en: In the later stages of the Chinese Civil War, the Truman administration adopted a "hands-off" policy toward China, imposing an arms embargo and, in 1949, publishing the China White Paper, which ceased military aid to the Republic of China government.

relationships.target: 德怀特·大卫·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 德怀特·艾森豪威尔于1953年1月20日接替哈里·S·杜鲁门成为美国总统。
description.en: Dwight D. Eisenhower succeeded Harry S. Truman as President of the United States on January 20, 1953.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门政府的“杜鲁门主义”和“围堵政策”使美苏关系从二战时的盟友转变为冷战中的敌人。
description.en: The Truman administration's Truman Doctrine and policy of containment transformed the US-Soviet relationship from WWII allies to adversaries in the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统签署了《1947年国家安全法案》，对美国的军事和情报机构进行了重大改组。
description.en: President Truman signed the National Security Act of 1947, which enacted a major reorganization of the American military and intelligence agencies.

description.zh-cn: 《1947年国家安全法案》的通过设立了美国国防部。
description.en: The passage of the National Security Act of 1947 established the Department of Defense.

description.zh-cn: 《1947年国家安全法案》的通过设立了中央情报局。
description.en: The passage of the National Security Act of 1947 established the Central Intelligence Agency.

description.zh-cn: 麦卡锡等保守派将国共内战和朝鲜战争的失误归责于杜鲁门，并指责其政府对待共产主义摇摆不定，对其进行强烈谴责。
description.en: Conservatives like McCarthy blamed Truman for setbacks in the Chinese Civil War and the Korean War, accusing his administration of being irresolute towards communism and strongly condemning him.
